metadata.title: CVE-2019-14288 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an Integer overflow inthe function JBIG2Bitmap::combine at JBIG2Stream.cc for the "one byte perline" case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler90 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
poppler-utils - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
ipe package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
